biotools.summary: A tool for analysis of normalisation effects on quantitative omics data and for subsequent differential expression analysis. The tool provides multiple normalisation methods and access to different statistical tests and generates reports and data matrices

bioschemas.name: NormalyzerDE
bioschemas.summary: A tool for analysis of normalisation effects on quantitative omics data and for subsequent differential expression analysis. The tool provides multiple normalisation methods and access to different statistical tests and generates reports and data matrices
